titleStmt.title: Donzella desterrada. Or, The banish'd virgin. VVritten originally in Italian: by Cavalier Gio. Francesco Biondi, Gentleman Extraordinary of his Majesties Privy Chamber. Divided into three bookes: and Englished by I.H. of Graies Inne, Gent
Donzella desterrada. English
titleStmt.author: Biondi, Giovanni Francesco, Sir, 1572-1644.
Hayward, James, of Gray's Inn.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T. Cotes, for Humphrey Mosley, and are to be sold at his shoppe, at the three Kings in Pauls Church yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe, at the three Kings in Pauls Church yard
